long_description: Extremely cold days call for the best in protection! The soft and snuggly SmartWool balaclava uses pure merino wool to keep you warm while also managing moisture. Soft merino wool insulates, wicks away moisture and breathes-naturally! Fine merino fibers are soft and flexible and, therefore, don't itch like other wool. 3-panel design with flatlock seams creates a comfortable, functional fit. Long length offers excellent coverage. SmartWool logo on back.
short_description: Extremely cold days call for the best in protection! The soft and snuggly SmartWool balaclava uses pure merino wool to keep you warm while also managing moisture.
